name: Sinister Names
description:
A diabolical spelling bee! Spell the names of the elder gods, the great old ones, and other supernatural beings.

This game was made for the TIGSource Commonplace Book competition in November 2008. Games were designed based on the  entries in H.P. Lovecraft's semi-insane old notebooks.

"Ancient and unknown ruins—strange and immortal bird who speaks in a language horrifying and revelatory to the explorers."
